channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 16:40 Repel the threat of artillery shelling in the Myrivska territorial community. Follow further reports.
item.description: 游릭 16:40 Repel the threat of artillery shelling in the Myrivska territorial community. Follow further reports. #Myrivska_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游 14:00 FREE EVACUATION We ask you to urgently evacuate from the combat zone or dangerous territory of the Kharkiv region. 24-hour FREE hotline for the evacuation of the civilian population - 0800339291
item.description: 游 14:00 FREE EVACUATION We ask you to urgently evacuate from the combat zone or dangerous territory of the Kharkiv region. 24-hour FREE hotline for the evacuation of the civilian population - 0800339291#햌혞혪햫혜햨햦햧_햟햧쮏 This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
